name: Vicinelli
description:
Vicinelli is a logic puzzle game inspired by Flowix Games' Einstein.

The game is built with speed in mind. Try to beat your own times. You can go below the 30 seconds mark if you're fast enough.

This game was made for the Ginger Supremacy, I love you guys !

Vicinelli is published in loving memory of Wazabi, the game composer.
